title: Little: A Happiness Reminder from E. B. White’s Masterpiece “Charlotte’s Web”
description:
I love the opening passage from “Charlotte’s Web,” E. B. White’s masterpiece of children’s literature. It’s a great reminder that an ordinary day can remind us of the most transcendent values.
